title: Red, White & Royal Blue
author: Casey McQuiston
description: A romantic comedy about the First Son falling for the Prince of Wales.

title: The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo
author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
description: A reclusive Hollywood icon finally tells her story.

title: Where the Crawdads Sing
author: Delia Owens
description: A mysterious tale about the 'Marsh Girl' of the Carolina coast.

title: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides
description: A psychological thriller about a woman who refuses to speak.

title: Educated
author: Tara Westover
description: A powerful memoir about education and self-invention.

title: The Midnight Library
author: Matt Haig
description: Between life and death there is a library, and within that library, the shelves go on forever.

title: Klara and the Sun
author: Kazuo Ishiguro
description: A thrilling book that offers a look at our changing world through the eyes of an unforgettable narrator.

title: The Lost City of Z
author: David Grann
description: A tale of deadly obsession in the Amazon rainforest.

title: Sapiens
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: A brief history of humankind and our journey through time.

title: Guns, Germs, and Steel
author: Jared Diamond
description: The fates of human societies and their development.

title: The Silk Roads
author: Peter Frankopan
description: A new history of the world through ancient trade routes.

title: 1177 B.C.
author: Eric Cline
description: The year civilization collapsed.

title: The Dawn of Everything
author: David Graeber
description: A new history of humanity.

title: Civilizations
author: Laurent Binet
description: An alternative history where the Incas invade Europe.

title: The Thursday Murder Club
author: Richard Osman
description: Four unlikely friends meet weekly to investigate cold cases.

title: Beach Read
author: Emily Henry
description: Two rival writers end up next to each other at the beach.

title: The Invisible Life of Addie LaRue
author: V.E. Schwab
description: A woman cursed to be forgotten by everyone she meets.

title: Project Hail Mary
author: Andy Weir
description: A lone astronaut must save humanity.

title: The Song of Achilles
author: Madeline Miller
description: A tale of love and destiny in ancient Greece.

title: Aloe
author: Katherine Applegate
description: A heartwarming story told from a gorilla's perspective.
